title: DEVOUR IS BUGGED!!!
body:
The new jungle-item-enchantment Devour {{item:3710}}  has a huge bug! If you use a health potion your attack speed will drop and the Devour Stacks are gone while the pot is active!!! For example, let's say you kill dragon while this bug happens, you will not get a single stack of the 5 the dragon should give! However, this bug does not appear when your Devour is fully stacked. (Sated){{item:3930}} 
PLEASE MAKE RIOT NOTICE THIS BUG BY GIVING FEEDBACK TO THIS!!!
